timeline.bodyText: You should make sure that days.datas isn't empty here.
timeline.author: cpmeister
cpmeister

timeline.bodyText: Near identical code is used in two other places. Please consider refactoring into another method and calling that instead.
timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyText: Please move this logic into LinkyHandler instead.
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: I will but I don't understand why...
replies.author: lolodomo

replies.bodyText: The reason I suggested moving the logic is because you want to minimize the amount of logic you are doing in DTO classes since the null checker doesn't check dto classes.
replies.author: cpmeister
